lenders.name: The Farren Family
lenders.loan_because: We believe in empowering people to make a self-sustaining life for themselves, to establish pride in their work, and to have self-esteem.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: Economic injustice sucks and microfinancing is cool.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: it is a wonderful way to make a contribution to someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a school psychologist.

lenders.name: Rita
lenders.loan_because: I respect a strong work ethic and the entrepreneurial spirit.

lenders.name: The Stormagans
lenders.loan_because: it seems like the very least we can do.

lenders.name: Gulley
lenders.loan_because: people have needs that I am able to help them fulfill.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an employee of the United States Government. I manage a variety of goods and services which people rely on daily.

lenders.name: The Baughers
lenders.occupational_info: I work on information systems which help my company become more efficient

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I believe our generation can bring justice to the world - i want to be part of that. AND by loaning,  a lil goes WAY further! This site is amazing...
lenders.occupational_info: As a designer I create a mixture of images and words on a computer in a way that is artistic but comunicates a message. My goal (and hope) is to impact people with my work so that it becomes something of worth to them and hopefully something they keep, not throw away. Currently i am working for (and am part of) a church called Mosaic (New Zeland)

lenders.name: kate
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others very much.
lenders.occupational_info: A helpful act.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.occupation: Connecting Good People with Great Opportunities
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of the entrepreneurial spirit.  I believe that the drive and passion of an entrepreneur is the force that will change one community at a time and thereby change the world
lenders.occupational_info: There is nothing that I am more convince of than the power of Good People and Great Opportunities.  Combining the two can and has led to the greatest advancements in the world and will continue to do so.  I want to be a part of that and have built my network and my world to provide that opportunity.

lenders.name: Milton
lenders.loan_because: A kind friend gave me 50 dollars to get started with Kiva and I've been talking about it ever since. It matters to me that my help connects directly with someone who needs it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am exploring how we might design better institutions for the future by combining ideas with smart delivery.

lenders.name: Sofia
lenders.loan_because: I believe Microfinance to be a very effective and dignified way to fight and eradicate poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a real estate appraiser, which means I estimate the value of a house in a real estate transaction.

lenders.name: Halvor
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea behind Kiva, and I hope this can make a difference to some entrepeneurs and their businesses.

lenders.name: The Johnsons
lenders.occupation: Clinical Edu Specialist, Special Education Teacher
lenders.loan_because: "When it's all over, it's not who you were . . . it's whether you made a difference."
lenders.occupational_info: My husband teaches hospitals how to use equipment they purchase and I teach special education.

lenders.name: Andre
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: As an American who has been very fortunate, I feel an obligation to help other people in less advantageous circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to promote conservation of our natural resources, especially the protection of unique natural areas in the state of Maine.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I have not gotten to where I am without the help of others, and I want to repay that generosity by helping other hard working and good people around the world. I love Kiva because it shows the world that everyday Americans really DO care about others all around the world! Best of luck to  my partners and I hope this finds you well!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell computer hardware & software products for the Data Storage Industry. I visit customers and travel to trade shows to evangelize our technology. I really enjoy the travel and meeting people!

lenders.name: Zen
lenders.loan_because: I feel that this method of financial exchange is a solution toward ending poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Hopefully, if I put my mind to it, I can take my international relations degree and go off to see the world, experience different cultures and gain a little wisdom.

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Liz

lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship, in development, in the interconnectedness of nations, and in doing the right thing. lenders.name: ILYAS
lenders.loan_because: I love watching something grow and transform
lenders.occupational_info: I write music for choirs to sing and I am a doctor

lenders.occupational_info: I work serving food at a Corporate Restaurant in order to raise money to pay for my education.  I hope to be an attorney of International law and am currently studying Anthropology.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: It takes money to make money.

lenders.name: Myra Breunig
lenders.loan_because: People need.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense!

lenders.name: Leo
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's the right thing to do. I've seen what can be accomplished with the accumulated efforts of individuals as a group. As one person, fixing poor situations seem too overwhelming, if at all possible. Joining others, in a group effort, makes a difference. It might seem small at the start, however, I've had first hand experience of how things can be made better, over time. As the saying goes, "How Do You Eat an Elephant"? Answer, "One Bite At A Time".
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the biopharmaceutical manufacturing industry. My work consist of evaluating systems, operations and manufactring procedures and operations. From these evaluations, decisions are made as to the proper performance and/or identifying systemic problems which require correction and/or improvement.

lenders.name: Keala

I greatly admire their ingenuity, their determination, their imagination and capacity to hope, but overall I admire their ability to take those strengths and use them to change their world. I loan because I also want to change the world in my own small way, and ultimately to be a part of something larger than myself.

lenders.occupational_info: Well, my work  is too, in first time, to the care of medio Ambiente. and the second time, to may mothersn with childres, but to be singles.

lenders.name: kim
lenders.loan_because: I am excited about what this site is doing in the lives of folks around the world. As a person who spends half the year in 3rd world countries for work, I see first hand very ambitious people living in poverty...and how it could be eliminated when an opportunity is realized.

lenders.name: La Vernia High School
lenders.loan_because: We loan to help those who are working hard to make a better life for themselves.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: I guess I'm not being very original here, but I think this a great opportunity to help people find their way out of poverty through local initiatives - rather than large-scale industrial crap. lenders.occupational_info: I read words and try to frame them in a way the professor doesn't have the choice to jot down an "A" on my sheet.

lenders.name: Tilly

As a woman, I believe that it is important to support other women in their endeavours, as they empower themselves and enrich the lives of those around them. With the access to education, finance and ability to financially support themselves, they can have choices and freedom.  I send both lenders and entrepreneurs, the very best of wishes for success.

lenders.name: Marshall
lenders.loan_because: we must.

An effort made for the happiness of others lifts us above ourselves. Lydia Maria Child

lenders.name: Marion
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: dolores
lenders.loan_because: This is in memory of our parents, Clemence & Beatrice Krentz.  You are dearly missed.  Love, Dolores, Margaret, Arlene, Westley, Mary-Lou, Elaine, Gord and Cameron.

lenders.name: Wendy

lenders.occupational_info: Mother, wife, accountant, carpenter, electrician, business expert, hairdresser, beautician, agenda and general bottle washer.  Being a working mother makes you very resourceful and you can do anything

lenders.name: Bill & Patti
lenders.loan_because: I had the opportunity to make a good living which enabled me to live with respect and dignity and now it's my turn to help someone else have the same opportunity!!  Thank you KIVA!!

lenders.name: David Andersson
lenders.occupation: CEO at Ecoera Biofuel Engineering AB
lenders.loan_because: Rural development is the key to a more sustainable future.
lenders.occupational_info: I am increasing the rate at which the society can switch from fossil to renewable fuels.

lenders.name: Stélios
lenders.loan_because: I believe the future of development resides in human capital.  Innovation, Drive, and Realization are the qualities small entrepreneurs throughout the world have, but cannot realize because of a lack of capital.  As a student I don't have much money, but find it crucial to put a little bit in the Kiva basket!
lenders.occupational_info: I am an International student from France at GVSU in Grand Rapids, MI, United States.  I am currently working towards an MBA and wish to pursue a career in socially-conscious business.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microcredits do work!
lenders.occupational_info: Director of an IT company

lenders.name: tricia brown
lenders.loan_because: it's important to have a keen awareness of what's going on in the world and to not take things for granted. Contributing as little as $25 can impact a family across the world, leading to a better life and self sustaining business. There's no reason not to help! "Small acts, when multiplied by millions of people, can transform the world." Howard Zinn
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large corporation in finance, and volunteer as an arts mentor for abused, at-risk, neglected children.

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.loan_because: "Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could only do a little"  - Edmund Burke
lenders.occupational_info: I am in Advertising

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: For a small amount of money, I can make a difference in the life of a person trying to improve their  life and the lives of their family
lenders.occupational_info: I own a sound equipment rental company in Tucson, AZ.  We do live concerts and also rent equipment to individuals.

lenders.name: Dennis

lenders.occupational_info: I'm an occasional Professor and teacher of art, as well as an artist.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because:
it's a privilege to be able to help others around the world. I'm inspired by the great service that Kiva is providing to the developing world.  

Thornton Wilder said, "Money is like manure; it's not worth a thing unless it's spread around encouraging young things to grow."
lenders.occupational_info: I manage assets of institutions and high-net-worth individuals.  Our investment philosophy is to "invest in the best."

lenders.name: Barreda Family
lenders.loan_because: Having the ability to help someone is a gift to be shared

lenders.name: Julien
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping directly people in need.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I believe business can play an important role in enabling sustainable development.

lenders.name: Mrs. V
lenders.loan_because: I care and I can.  I know how difficult it can be to obtain start-up captial for a new business.  These people deserve a chance, especially to provide for their family.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.occupational_info: energy, love, a space for clarity and movement - inviting true freedom in the heart!

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a team of technology folks who implement and maintain systems to support personal insurance products.

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.loan_because: The world is a very small place, and we are all in this together.

lenders.name: karen
lenders.loan_because: "...the growing good of the world is partly dependent on unhistoric acts; and that things are not so ill with you and me as they might have been, is half owing to the number who lived faithfully a hidden life, and rest in unvisited tombs."  - George Elliot, Middlemarch

lenders.name: Tom and Diane
lenders.loan_because:
People willing to work hard should have access to capital to build their business.


"How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world." -- Anne Frank

lenders.name: Will Holt
lenders.loan_because: it improves the world, effectively and efficiently.

lenders.occupational_info: Magazine editor

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I am so thankful for all of my blessings and want to reach out  to those in need.

lenders.name: Marty
lenders.loan_because: I can, and because there's so much good in my life it would be wrong not to spread some around.  Also, I've been helped a lot, so passing help on is both a pleasure and moral duty.

lenders.occupational_info: I do stuff and I hope to branch out into also doing things.

lenders.name: Lisa

lenders.name: Glicerio
lenders.loan_because: The world is just one and people need each other always. Today is for them tomorrow will be you.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: the same money can help many people.

lenders.name: Fabian
lenders.occupation: Team Coach and Manager of Javison United F.C.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: Maimonides said the highest form of charity is helping the less fortunate achieve independence, so that they will not have to depend on charity.

lenders.name: Lesley
lenders.loan_because: I want to give to people who need a helping hand.  I hope that I can help someone change their life in a positive way!  Sure feels good too.
lenders.occupational_info: I sit at a desk and work on the computer.  I assist other associates in their company's initiatives.

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: I have the money to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I review computer programs to make sure they work as they are required.

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.  Christian principles compel me to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I make furniture out of wood.

lenders.name: Alfredo Eduardo
lenders.loan_because: I strongly believe that this is the only way we can end poverty.  My family is blessed and we have everything we need; so I feel it's our social responsibiltiy to give back to those in need.

lenders.name: Cas and Jim Czarnezki
lenders.loan_because: The good we do ripples into the world and makes a better home for all of us.  Our donation may mean more than we'll ever know.
lenders.occupational_info: Others have done kind things for us  so we pass the favor on.

lenders.name: Christophe
lenders.loan_because: I find it the most effective way to support an  entrepreneur that want to develop its business, while participating to a global effort to make live better
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved in worldwide information technology projects to help large business run more effectively on a global scale

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I want to help. Micro loans make sense and they have proven to be very successful. There is no limit to amount of 'need' on the globe and Kiva puts a face to some of those stories.
lenders.occupational_info: I write stories about interesting people, events and themes.

lenders.name: Puneet
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people who want to help themselves. I believe in hard work and want to support people who are willing to put in the hard work and are not able to make something out of their lives because they do not have the financial resources.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is related to financing medium to large size businesses. I am also actively involved in financing large real estate projects.

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: I feel very fortunate, to have a job and be able to provide for my daughter and would like to help others to achieve fianancial independence.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in managing risk for a telecomunications company

lenders.name: Marc & Christen
lenders.loan_because: Our 10th wedding anniversary is tomorrow and instead of spending the money on some fancy dinner or something for ourselves, we thought the best testament to what we've stood for together all these years is giving to others.  We think of it as a gift both to us and to someone trying to keep their family together, just as we have.
lenders.occupational_info: Marc works in HR to hire, promote and help employees do their best job possible at work.  Christen teaches leadership to college students.

lenders.name: Elizabeth and Don
lenders.loan_because: It is a small affordable way to help people who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a classroom with students who need extra help to succeed. I support the teacher in her work also.

lenders.name: Archibald
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference for others.
lenders.occupational_info: We own successful restaurants.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: From the moment I first heard of Muhammad Yunus and micro-lending, several years ago, I was absolutely inspired by the idea---and I still am. I love that one person on one side of the world can do something that impacts the lives of a family or a community on the other side. This community of Kiva is a gift for all of us.
lenders.occupational_info: I help provide safe, clean, affordable housing for families.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those in need.

lenders.name: Nicole

lenders.name: Thomas

lenders.occupational_info: I teach accounting (contibilidad, if I remember my Spanish correctly).

lenders.name: Total Package consulting
lenders.loan_because: When trying to help themselves , everyone deserves a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: Packaging consultants creative and design firm.

lenders.name: Phuong
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: UO Nonprofit Class 07
lenders.loan_because: we cant to make a small difference in the world. We are strong believers of the nonprofit sector and together, we will soon make a change!

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of small businesses to improve lives and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses attract customers on the internet.

lenders.name: John

lenders.occupational_info: I have a company that designs and manufactures UV protective clothing for kids.  The goal is to instill safe sun habits at an early age.

lenders.name: Paul & Julia
lenders.loan_because: Because we care and because we can.
lenders.occupational_info:
Julia works for a PBS television station. 
Paul is a territory manager for a floor covering manufacturer.

lenders.name: Majdi A.J
lenders.loan_because: Treat others like i want to be treated. im only human and i will need help one way or another one day and that's when i will hopefully collect my return on investment.

lenders.name: Girl Soldier
lenders.loan_because: I love to help other people improve their lives.  I believe there are enough resources in our world to make each person wealthy.  I hate to see people go without their basic needs when they are making the effort by working hard.  If you have the means to help another person, do so and do it today, you may not have tomorrow to do it or they may not have tomorrow.  Now is your time to make a difference.

lenders.name: SOUFIANE LAILANI
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Ted
lenders.loan_because: There have been times when people did small things (for them) that were of huge help to me.  I like to pass on those favors.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop coatings and films that are used as components in various industrial products (everything from TVs to photovoltaic panels).

lenders.name: iju
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I play marimba and teach school band.

lenders.name: Nikki
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great cause!

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I think it's wonderful to be able to see directly where my money is going, and I love the idea that a loan can make such a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Engineers Without Borders Australia, who work with disadvantaged communities around the world to improve their quality of life through sustainable engineering projects.

lenders.name: Yonuk&Noriko
lenders.loan_because: Someone challenging to better life like us who are trying  to reallize our new dream gives us lots of energy and encourages so warmly.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: There's much need in the world. It's a privilege to participate in a program that helps people become more self-sufficent.
lenders.occupational_info: Information provider

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I continue to do it because it makes me feel good that someone will pay it forward. Like the circle of life so too will this money keep going.
lenders.occupational_info:
Lots of number checking of sales. cash received and money to pay out.  And at the end of the month I let the owners know what profit they made that month and in the last 12 months total.  

Basically you must love numbers and computers

lenders.name: Constance Burger
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I really care about giving people a sense of dignity. I know it means  a lot to me when I accomplish something toward financial independence in my life, and so I know it means  a lot to the people who receive our loans.
lenders.occupational_info:
I write the stories and poetry that rise up in my heart in hopes to encourage and inspire humanity.

JUST BELIEVE
You’ve got to see beyond the moment.
You’ve got to see beyond the now.
For there’s a place to see,
A future destiny,
With no need - to ask how. 

Oh just believe, just believe,
Remember those words you heard in your heart,
It was no fantasy.
Oh just believe, just believe,
For that day in time - when all is defined,
And all is redeemed.

Just close your eyes,
And let your heart take you there again.
The first time - when your heart,
Made hope - its true friend.

Spend time with your dreams there,
Painting all their colors supreme.
Filling in all the details,
And taking them to the extreme.

Oh just believe, just believe,
Remember those words you heard in your heart,
It was no fantasy.
Oh just believe, just believe,
For that day in time - that all is defined,
And all is redeemed.

lenders.name: Zaadz Visionary Music
lenders.loan_because:
This lender's account is fueled by sales of the Zaadz Visionary Music community's benefit compilation, "The Dream Is Valid."  All of the artists and businesspeople involved get exposure, and all proceeds get recirculated the world over to empower people.  People get great music by  shopping in alignment with their values, and their money helps promote sustainable business practices.  Everyone wins – and we prove that the good, beautiful, true, and practical can all support each other.  

For more information, please visit
http://thedreamisvalid.bandcamp.com
lenders.occupational_info:
We are a community of artists and appreciators who recognize a new relationship between art, business, science, and spirituality - and are exploring the new commerce of art as loving effort.  

Our benefit compilation can be listened to and purchased at http://thedreamisvalid.bandcamp.com

lenders.name: Schrodinger
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Sleep, Eat, Sleep, Invest in good people, Sleep.

lenders.name: Asha
lenders.loan_because:
I am in desperate need of $9,000.00. I have been running my home based business successfully for the last 6 years, it afforded me the opportunity together with my husband's job to purchase our own home. My problem arised when I started having kids, kid #1 came in 2004, kid #2 came in 2006 and now kid #3 who is just 2 months old. My business has the potential to do very very well, but my problem is when i got pregant with my third baby, my 2nd baby was just 2 months old and having two subsequent pregnancies that close together it left me very very exhausted and unable to run my business. My husband worked very hard to take care of the house bills and the other two kids, since he is not very educated he can do only trade jobs, it did pay some bills but not enough to totally pay all. Now I had my third baby and I am very well  now but my business is suffering, I lost many customers during the time i was pregant. I need this money to catch up on many bills, Property taxes in arrears for one year 3000.00 , tax return due $532.00,  power and gas in arrears $400.00 and many other bills. I do not want to loose my  house, this is the first house i have ever owned, i am making my mortgage payments just fine. Please if you people out there can help me get out of this problem I will be sure to PAY BACK THE LOAN. Once my backlogged bills gets taken care of then I am back to square one and can afford all my bills and more since I am in full health after having the 3rd baby. Together with my husband and my salary we can have a very good living.
Thanks so very much.
lenders.occupational_info: Costume Jewelry. Stay at home mom with 3 kids to support.

lenders.name: Ann & Rob
lenders.loan_because: We have travelled and met just the sort of people for whom Kiva is set up. It is our way of putting something back in.
lenders.occupational_info: Rob works as an educational manager and I work in publishing and  computing coaching.

lenders.name: Almeta
lenders.loan_because: I see the importance of microeconomics
lenders.occupational_info: Raising future leaders

lenders.name: Khanh
lenders.loan_because: I need to enlarge our cinnamon-worm farm. We use cinnamon-worm to feed the fish.
lenders.occupational_info: You will smell the cinnamon in place where people think it can't be. That is my farm.

lenders.name: Murray
lenders.loan_because: It is great to be able to help those who are helping themselves; and by offering so little it means so much to them.

lenders.name: Janelle
lenders.loan_because: I feel spoiled to live in the relatively wealthy USA where we complain about the slightest inconvenience. It is great to be able to share in some small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I run the office of a brilliant, compassionate, world-class attorney; I do everything needed to help him offer legal services to our clients and to interact with the Courts.  We provide urgently needed assistance to people who truly deserve the help. I love it.

lenders.name: Hunter
lenders.occupation: Director of Programs, Pat Tillman Foundation
lenders.loan_because: I am human.

lenders.name: Kevin

lenders.occupational_info: Radiology

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Many small actions can change the world.

lenders.name: Elleni
lenders.loan_because: I am very fortunate and feel blessed. To be able to assist someone in need in a real and valuable way is a wonderful thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I had my own business - selling beds to people. . I am now retired after being injured in a road accident.

lenders.name: Darin Greyerbiehl
lenders.loan_because: I've seen how it works...and it works well.

lenders.name: Tami
lenders.occupation: Interior Architect, Life Adventurer, Kiva Fellow
lenders.loan_because: I've seen with my own eyes that just a little bit makes a difference in the lives of those with limited resources + opportunity

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: as tough as times get, I never forget how fortunate I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a graphic designer for internet applications.

lenders.name: pamela
lenders.loan_because: If it was any of us living in a third world country wouldn't we want  help? My heart goes out to those folks that need a loan to improve their lives at the cost of a nice dinner for most of us.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I want to provide opportunities for people.
lenders.occupational_info:
libraries = free education  
education = a better world

lenders.name: Lutz
lenders.loan_because: I believe that supporting enterpreuners is more useful than another tax-funded development project that does not address the needs of its recipients.
lenders.occupational_info: I study civil wars and their causes.

lenders.name: Athar
lenders.loan_because: Have been thru difficult times when out of no where Allah's savior helped me. I feel Kiva is one of Allah's saviors for those who are ready to work hard to come out of difficult times.

lenders.name: Rameri
lenders.occupation: Monkey Wrangler and General Manager of Tomfoolery
lenders.loan_because: An accident of birth and I am here with the capacity to help others. Had I been born somewhere else, and been less fortunate than I am, I would hope others would help me.

lenders.name: Adibah
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the principle of helping others to one's best ability... what kiva is doing is something that I personally believe in and I'm glad to be able to help someone else who needs that helping hand... it gives hope and God-willing, life will get better... :)
lenders.occupational_info:
My company is a solution provider and integrator for Intelligent Transportation Systems.  My role is to grow our market share, explore and expand our business portfolio.
My lovely daughter, who will be turning 6 soon, is the source of my strength, inspiration and happiness...

lenders.name: Malavan
lenders.occupational_info: Responsible for an Higher Education Institute

lenders.name: Gbenga
lenders.loan_because: i want to build a community resource centre for poor young people in Ghana. The centre will allow them access information, read books, train them on business skills etc.
lenders.occupational_info: Community development, information sharing, youth development and micro-finance

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Each and every one of us has the opportunity to make a difference each and every day.  And every time someone makes a difference, no matter how small, in the life of someone else, every one of us benefits just a little bit as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop and conduct both instructor-lead and web-based training programs.

lenders.name: maria
lenders.loan_because: We need to learn to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I not only read Tarot but listen to the problems of others and try to help in whatever way I can. Sometimes it is just enough to listen quietly.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because:
"The gratification of wealth is not found in mere possession or in lavish expenditure, but in its wise application."

Miguel de Cervantes (1547-1616) Spanish novelist, dramatist and poet.


Kiva is one small way to be part of finding solutions for  Global Inequality on many levels.
lenders.occupational_info:
The Best Shoe Store and Repair shop in town!!!!
THE SHOE DOCTOR!
Even though we are a very busy full Shoe Repair we also  sell Quality Footwear and Apparel from around the world understanding that as a business owner I have a DUTY to support companies that practice Fair Trade Standards ensuring workers  are paid a living wage!

lenders.name: Russell
lenders.loan_because: I've enjoyed the fruits of my own endeavours and had help and advice along the way. Paying something forward to an individual  who wants to help themselves just seems like the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small systems house specialising in supplying systems and software to the Foodservice Distribution Industry.

lenders.name: Clark
lenders.loan_because: Jesus first loved me. How can I not give a loving hand to help others?

lenders.name: Roswitha
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should be safe, fed, and have a dream.  I want to help others improve their circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: I love books and travel.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I was captured by how well this program works.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: we all need to do our part to help each other live full, dignified, and healthy lives.

lenders.name: Lady Lodge Systems
lenders.loan_because: Instead of buying Christmas cards for our customers, we choose to spend the money on helping people help themselves through Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: LLS is a small systems house providing Systems and Software for the Foodservice Distribution Industry

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: i've been loaned to

lenders.name: TUSAAF Stars & Stripes
lenders.loan_because: We try to help Youth American Football programs in new areas overseas who are looking to expand or improve American Football programs abroad.  TUSAAF works on a very limited budget and works on trying to help new organization recieve aid in building Americna Football programs from top to bottum.
lenders.occupational_info: Team promotes the goodwill of American Football around the world and works with different Youth and amateur organizations to promote the sport in professional manner at the amateur level. TUSAAF has volunteers in the United States and abroad who work on different events to help with the growth of American Football in new areas and up and coming areas that are intersted in starting American Football programs or create new american football programs with highly qualified instructors from the United States who are many case located overseas.

lenders.name: brittany
lenders.loan_because: I believe in open hands.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Slacker Radio, an internet radio company with a free interface and over 100 different individually programmed format stations, plus the ability to customize your own stations!  I also do independent voicework.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: My Christian faith is all about loving. Justice flows from love. Giving restores justice.  Giving is loving.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm founder of The Water Project, Inc. a non-profit working to provide clean water to developing communities around the world.  Come get involved!

lenders.name: Jose
lenders.loan_because: This is one way of ending the hideous gap between rich and poor
lenders.occupational_info: Helping others make money.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: i can help make someone's life better for the cost of a meal out at a restaurant.
lenders.occupational_info: I help run a small internet & phone company.

lenders.name: Rajni
lenders.loan_because: I want to repay the kindness of people who helped us when we needed it.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: I want capitalism to flourish throughout the world.  It is the most effective way to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping small company teams successfully serve the customers and market through new products and outstanding service.

lenders.name: Johannes
lenders.loan_because: This is a good way to help, and I can be certain that the money arrives to people that need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an oil company.

lenders.name: Jess Duran
lenders.loan_because:
There's no greater satisfaction in this world than serving others.  

My parents come from a very poor rural town in Mexico. I could never repay my parents back for all they've done for me, but I can always "pay it forward" to reach and touch someone else. 

I have a VERY comfortable lifestyle here in America, and this reminds me of how blessed we really are.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Media/Communications.

lenders.name: Halo Noir
lenders.loan_because: Things would've been easier if someone had helped me with my entrepreneurial efforts.  Also, I believe this method of help truly makes a difference and isn't just a "temporary fix"!
lenders.occupational_info:
I am currently running a Kickstarter for a Zombie Card Game I designed: Zombie ApocalyOOPS!  Please check it out!

tinyurl.com/apocalyoops

lenders.name: anthony
lenders.loan_because: Affordable Price
lenders.occupational_info:
Hello my friend,

I hope you are well!

This is ANTHONY LIM and I wanted to give
you a quick heads up on a great new system, that
helps you gain access to one of the most wanted 
and profitable businesses around at a fraction
of the usual cost.

Rather than trying to explain everything here,
I have set up a special link with everything 
you need to know:

http://www.vibolfilms.com

If you have any questions, please contact me.

Thanks and hope to hear from you soon.

Your successfully,
ANTHONY LIM
